5. Mobile Behavior

On mobile devices (screens < 640px), the "Follow us" text is hidden and icons are slightly smaller. Hover effects are disabled in favor of touch-friendly active states.

Resize your browser window to see responsive behavior.

{% include 'components/social_links.html' %}

6. Accessibility Features

The component includes comprehensive accessibility features:

  • ARIA Labels: Each link has descriptive aria-label attributes
  • Keyboard Navigation: Use Tab, Arrow keys, Home, End to navigate
  • Focus Indicators: Clear focus outlines with proper contrast
  • Screen Reader Support: Tooltips and status announcements
  • Reduced Motion: Respects prefers-reduced-motion setting
  • High Contrast: Enhanced borders and text in high contrast mode

Try navigating with keyboard only:

{% include 'components/social_links.html' %}

7. Integration Guide

How to use this component in your templates:

Basic Usage:

{% verbatim %}{% include 'components/social_links.html' %}{% endverbatim %}

With Custom Classes:

<div class="social-links social-links--centered social-links--large"> <!-- Component content will be rendered here --> </div>

Available CSS Classes:

  • social-links--centered - Centers the component
  • social-links--large - Larger icons (52px)
  • social-links--small - Smaller icons (36px)
  • social-links--standalone - Adds padding and background
  • social-links--animated - Adds subtle pulse animation
